statements: SELECT * FROM financial_metrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM financial_metrics WHERE metric_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM financial_metrics WHERE metric_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_metrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT metric_date, COUNT(*) FROM financial_metrics GROUP BY metric_date;
SELECT * FROM financial_metrics ORDER BY metric_date DESC, metric_value ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value FROM financial_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT AVG(metric_value) AS average_value, YEAR(metric_date) AS year FROM financial_metrics GROUP BY YEAR(metric_date) ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT metric_name, COUNT(*) AS frequency FROM financial_metrics GROUP BY metric_name ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_metrics WHERE metric_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY metric_date ASC, metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM key_metrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM key_metrics ORDER BY metric_name DESC;
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value, report_date FROM key_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM performance_indicators WHERE id = 5;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value FROM performance_indicators WHERE indicator_value < 50 ORDER BY indicator_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM key_metrics WHERE metric_value > 1000
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value FROM key_metrics WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM key_metrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC
SELECT * FROM performance_indicators WHERE indicator_value < 500
SELECT id, indicator_name FROM performance_indicators WHERE indicator_description LIKE '%important%'
SELECT * FROM financial_metrics;
SELECT metric_id, metric_name FROM financial_metrics WHERE metric_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM performance_indicators ORDER BY actual_value DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_content FROM reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM financial_metrics WHERE metric_value > 1000;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM financial_metrics WHERE metric_value BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_indicators WHERE actual_value < target_value;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_name, LENGTH(report_content) AS content_length FROM reports WHERE LENGTH(report_content) > 1000 ORDER BY content_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_metrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM financial_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM performance_indicators ORDER BY indicator_value DESC;
SELECT indicator_id, indicator_name FROM performance_indicators WHERE indicator_value < 50;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM financial_metrics WHERE metric_value > 1000 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;

SELECT dashboard_id, metric_name, indicator_name, date, value FROM dashboard_data INNER JOIN financial_metrics ON dashboard_data.metric_id = financial_metrics.metric_id INNER JOIN performance_indicators ON dashboard_data.indicator_id = performance_indicators.indicator_id WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM dashboard_data WHERE value > 5000 AND metric_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_metrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_description FROM financial_metrics WHERE metric_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM dashboard_users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM dashboard_data WHERE data_value > 100 AND data_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_description FROM performance_indicators ORDER BY indicator_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_metrics
SELECT metric_name, metric_description FROM financial_metrics ORDER BY metric_name DESC
SELECT * FROM performance_indicators WHERE indicator_id = 3
SELECT * FROM dashboard_data WHERE data_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'

SELECT dd.data_id, dm.metric_name, pi.indicator_name, dd.data_value FROM dashboard_data AS dd JOIN financial_metrics AS dm ON dd.metric_id = dm.metric_id JOIN performance_indicators AS pi ON dd.indicator_id = pi.indicator_id ORDER BY dd.data_value DESC
